name: codenexus-ai
description: CodeNexus AI - An AI extension to VSCode, combining OpenRouter and Ollama.

CodenexusAI.OllamaModels.description: Unique IDs of the models that you have downloaded locally from Ollama (list Ollama Models and Names in the same order).

CodenexusAI.OllamaModelNames.description: Names of the models from Ollama (list Ollama Models and Names in the same order).

CodenexusAI.UseOllama.description: Use Ollama to run local LLMs.

CodenexusAI.OpenRouterModelNames.description: Names of the Large Language Models from OpenRouter (list OpenRouter Models and Names in the same order).

CodenexusAI.OpenRouterModels.description: Unique IDs of the Large Language Models from OpenRouter (list OpenRouter Model and Names in the same order).

CodenexusAI.ContextFileSize.description: Maximum number of files that can be kept for context.

CodenexusAI.ContextInteractionSize.description: The length of interaction history used for context.

CodenexusAI.FilesExcluded.description: Files you want excluded from being accessed by the extension in the working directory using glob patterns: (https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/glob-patterns).

CodenexusAI.FilesIncluded.description: Files you want the extension to access using glob patterns in the working directory: (https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/glob-patterns) (empty access everything).

CodenexusAI.SystemPrompt.description: Custom system prompt, which will be added in addition to the 'Agent' prompt when in Agent Mode.
